Top = 0 Left = 0 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "INSTANCES" uniqueid = 601C1595B05F46FDA00D1C22A3788D5B Name = "MR_INSTANCES" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
Height = 456 Left = 12 Top = 36 Width = 936 _gridcontextmenulang = en showmemocolumns = .T. Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE DblClick _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid)
Do Form MR_MODS ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 12 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_add_black_18dp.png Caption = "ADD" ToolTipText = "ADD INSTANCES" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand6"
Top = 0 Left = 84 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_clear_black_18dp.png Caption = "DELETE" ToolTipText = "DELETE SELECTED INSTANCE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Delete Next 1 In 'mr_instances'
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 420 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "OPEN" ToolTipText = "OPEN THE INSTANCE MODS TAB" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid)
Do Form MR_MODS ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 312 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_folder_black_18dp.png Caption = "SERVER FOLDER" ToolTipText = "SELECT A TARGET SERVER FOLDER TO CREATE A SERVER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbstyle = 7 Name = "tbfolder"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local iserverfol, lastfolder
If Empty(mr_instances.iserverfol)
m.lastfolder = mr_instances.ifolder
Else
m.lastfolder = mr_instances.iserverfol
Endif
m.iserverfol = Getdir(m.lastfolder, 'Select target server folder for this instance', '', 1 + 64 + 16 + 32)
If Not Empty(m.iserverfol) Then
Replace mr_instances.iserverfol With m.iserverfol In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.Refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 156 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_bottom_black_18dp.png Caption = "MINVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MIN MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "_tbcommand3"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
*!* Lparameters pItemID, pParentId, pItemType, pItemChecked, pItemDisabled, pItemCaption, pItemPicture
Go Top
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, mr_enum_gameversion.gver)
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver Replace mr_instances.gverlong1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong
Endif
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 228 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_top_black_18dp.png Caption = "MAXVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MAX MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "_tbcommand4"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver Replace mr_instances.gverlong2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong
Endif
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC
